<img src="readme/title.png" width="45%"/>
<h2>Segment14 is a font (made by me) that represents a lcd display with 14 segments. You can use it for free, no credits required!</h2>

<h3>You can download the font using the following links:</h3>

[![apk](https://img.shields.io/badge/Font_file_.ttf-Download-FBD75B?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://hms-douglas.github.io/segment14/Fonts/Segment14.ttf)

[![apk](https://img.shields.io/badge/Font_file_.woff-Download-FBD75B?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://hms-douglas.github.io/segment14/Fonts/Segment14.woff)

[![apk](https://img.shields.io/badge/SVGs-Generate-FBD75B?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://hms-douglas.github.io/segment14)

[![apk](https://img.shields.io/badge/PNGs-Generate-FBD75B?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://hms-douglas.github.io/segment14)
